game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the cave.
game.description: Venture into the perilous Dark Hollow cave to find and retrieve the 'Eye of Truth' - an ancient artifact believed to grant the possessor pure truth.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a magical amulet

tasks.objective: Collect cave map from the local librarian
tasks.description: Visit the quaint library in the village square to obtain a map of Dark Hollow cave.

tasks.objective: Defeat the Gorgon Guardian at the cave entrance
tasks.description: To enter the cave, you will need to defeat the dreaded Gorgon Guardian.

tasks.objective: Navigate the cave labyrinth and retrieve the Eye of Truth
tasks.description: Use the map to navigate the treacherous cave labyrinth. Locate and retrieve the Eye of Truth.
